TopicTitle: A mod that keeps your fuel forever!

Articles.Content: A mod that can make the fuel not run out. I mean its a good idea for beginners or people who wants to toy arounda bit with there ship and have a safe landing.
the game already has this with the dev console, to get it to pop up, press ctrl-alt-shift-d
I think it's a bad idea, especially for beginners.
Really,i agree with Nibb.They need to learn the basics of rocket building.

Also, there are plenty premade .craft files that can take you to the Mun and back.

Having inifinite fuel is just silly. The whole point of flying a rocket is managing fuel.
Thanks i didnt know we had that.
